__e: I mean, it's awfully deep and awfully wet, and I just don't think I would make it.
I thought of just leaving. But he was all wet in the rain and I should share.
I can't get much wetter, what if you are killed, and I'll never see you again?
And as God is my witness, I'll never be wet again!
Ain't no problem that free food and free booze won't fix.
